title: My Lol Client Won't Open.
body:
**Right of the bat,** I play on a _MacBook Air, El Capitan Version 10.11.3_. 

I exited out of league and it would not open up again. It showed that i clicked the app, but the client wouldn't open. I then shut of my computer and checked around 3 times. After this, I deleted and reinstalled the game. It was working for the rest of the day, until i exited and tried to open it again. After this I repeat the steps before ( shut down and check). I then delete and reinstall the game another time, and the exact thing happened. It worked for like 5 hours, then I exited and it did the same exact thing. Does anyone know how to stop this? Because it is getting annoying having to reinstall every time i try to play league.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble establishing a connection to the servers, which would prevent the launcher from opening.  Our[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help get this fixed up!  Make sure to select Mac options for instructions specific to your OS.  I hope that helps!
